actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend the duty on railroad rolling stock exported for repairs or alteration on or before June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Suspends the import duty under the tariff schedules of the United States on railroad and railway rolling stock exported for repairs or alteration on or before June 30, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the duty on railroad rolling stock exported for repairs or alteration on or before June 30, 1975.
